title: Tadej Pogačar is Riding 165 mm Crank Arms, But Should You?
content:
Tadej Pogačar was riding 170 mm cranks as recently as last year. That’s to be expected for the 5’9″ (1.76 m) tall rider. This year, however, Pogi is out and about and riding 165 mm cranks.
